entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
